SRP.Q: In 1969, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Sales Team relative to Operations Staff?
SRP.A: In 1969, Sales Team is {above} Operations Staff in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Management Team, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1989 relative to that in 1972 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Management Team, the data point in 1989 is {below} and to the {right} of the data point in 1972.
